title: Kindle clippings to JSON
author: noshbrinken
content: readme.md -clippings--jsonformat 'kindle/documents/ clippings.txt' json.example[{ "body": " certain contexts least, transparency open code should a requirement.", "created_at": 1462434461, "title": "code version 2.0", "subtype": "highlight", "page": 143, "authors": ["lessig, lawrence"], "location_range": [2618, 2619]}]installation install pipsi.pipsi install .usage-clippings--json [options] input_path output_pathargumentsinput_pathpath input file.output_pathpath output file.file existing output_path be overwritten.options-h, --helpshow help page.-s, --start integerstart line number input file (default: 1).integer should the line the target clipping the last line thepreceding clipping. integer falls the middle a clipping, clipping be skipped.-clippings--json writes last line number stdout. next , start this line number.
